maintenance_interval.description: interval in sections between blockchain maintenance events

maintenance_skip_slots.description: average number of block_intervals to skip at maintenance time

committee_proposal_review_period.description: low minimum time in seconds that a proposed transaction requiring committee authority may not be signed, prior to expiration

maximum_transaction_size.description: average maximum allowable size in bytes for a transaction

maximum_block_size.description: average maximum allowable size in bytes for a block

maximum_time_until_expiration.description: average maximum lifetime in seconds for transactions to be valid, before expiring

maximum_proposal_lifetime.description: low maximum lifetime in seconds for proposed transactions to be kept, before expiring

maximum_asset_whitelist_authorities.description: low maximum number of accounts which an asset may list as authorities for its whitelist OR blacklist

maximum_asset_feed_publishers.description: low the maximum number of feed publishers for a given asset

maximum_witness_count.description: average maximum number of active witnesses

maximum_committee_count.description: average maximum number of active committee_members

maximum_authority_membership.description: low largest number of keys/accounts an authority can have

reserve_percent_of_fee.description: average the percentage of the network's allocation of a fee that is taken out of circulation

network_percent_of_fee.description: average percent of transaction fees paid to network

lifetime_referrer_percent_of_fee.description: average percent of transaction fees paid to network

cashback_vesting_period_seconds.description: low time after cashback rewards are accrued before they become liquid

cashback_vesting_threshold.description: low the maximum cashback that can be received without vesting

count_non_member_votes.description: set to false to restrict voting privileges to member accounts

allow_non_member_whitelists.description: true if non-member accounts may set whitelists and blacklists; false otherwise

witness_pay_per_block.description: average CORE to be allocated to witnesses (per block)

worker_budget_per_day.description: CORE to be allocated to workers (per day)

max_predicate_opcode.description: predicate_opcode must be less than this number

fee_liquidation_threshold.description: value in CORE at which accumulated fees in blockchain-issued market assets should be liquidated

accounts_per_fee_scale.description: number of accounts between fee scaling

account_fee_scale_bitshifts.description: number of times to left bitshift account registration fee at each scaling

max_authority_depth.description: number of iterations in depth when searching for keys

rsquared_witnesses_top_max.description: average limit witnesses top list to max 63 (consensus algorithm)

rsquared_witnesses_active_max.description: average randomly choose max 21 active witnesses (consensus algorithm)
